attributes.action: Introduce regulations in the nail industry
attributes.additional_details: Petitions have been started in the past but now we have advanced so much we the nail industry needs to be regulated more than ever. To make sure that treatments are being carried out thoughally and us as passionate nail techs and educators can continue in our profession to set the standards and keep them to where they should be. Its our profession its US that need to make some noise and get a step closer in the right direction. SO PLEASE SIGN and start making our voices herd.
attributes.background: The nail industry needs some regulations through out to encourage safer procedures on treatments and use with products. Regulations need to be put in place so we can be confident that the courses we attend are completely safe and regulated.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like new laws to regulate the nail industry, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like to be in those laws. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
